metadata.title: CVE-2023-51781 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. atalk_ioctl innet/appletalk/ddp.c has a use-after-free because of an atalk_recvmsg racecondition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-51781` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-21-generic - 6.5.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-21-generic - 6.5.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-21-generic-64k - 6.5.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1014-aws - 6.5.0-1014.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1015-azure - 6.5.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1014-gcp - 6.5.0-1014.14
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1010-laptop - 6.5.0-1010.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-21-lowlatency - 6.5.0-21.21.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-21-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-21.21.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1016-oracle - 6.5.0-1016.16
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1011-raspi - 6.5.0-1011.14
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1008-starfive - 6.5.0-1008.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-21.21').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1014.14').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1015.15').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1014.14').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1010.13').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-21.21.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1016.16').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1011.14').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1008.9').
